OrgName.entry: WILD SPIRIT ALLSTARS COMMUNITY CHEERLEADING CLUB

Desc.entry: Provides cheerleading activities for young people age 3-25 years and over including dance, cheers, tumbling, gymnastics and stunting. Run by qualified and experienced staff who are members of the UK Cheerleading Association. Performs at competitions, events and in schools.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Service lift to caf√©/bar. Changing Places Toilet available in this building.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Wed 6-9pm (children aged 16 years and over); Sun 12 noon-2pm (children aged 9 years and under), 2-5pm (children aged 10-16 years), 5-8pm (children aged 16 years and over)
